How I Schedule My Day for Productivity
I guarantee you it NEVER looks as glamorous on the inside as it does from the outside.
If you are comparing what is going on in your company to what you see your peers and competitors doing, and feel behind or inadequate, or in any way not up to par.....
Just let it go. You have no idea what they are going through that you cannot see. You never will. You don't need to.
Take a deep breath. Stay on your path. Stay focused on your mission. Stay focused on your customers. Stay focused on your team. Your family. Your health. Find connection and joy in your own journey.
Allow yourself to be inspired and fueled by others' success, but by all means, do not allow yourself to get derailed or thrown off of your path. Stay focused.

CNS Equity Partners is a boutique private equity firm focused on virtue-based investment strategies. We actively acquire and manage assets within the holistic health and alternative agriculture industries, as well as facilitate venture capital fundraising.Our portfolio of brands and companies creates a synergistic blend of talent, philanthropy, and enterprise. Our heart is in everything we do.

AURA enables companies to understand consumer needs, embrace new technologies, and get innovative products to market faster. We create brands, companies, and strategies that deliver measurable results. With our knowledge of the field, we provide pragmatic operational support as well as branding and marketing magic. Whether we’re building a business from the ground up or reorganizing talent, resources, and infrastructure, our experienced network of partners delivers. We create to inspire.

As a regulatory compliance consultant in the international investment and banking industry, I help asset managers successfully implement and maintain a comprehensive compliance program. Clients include banks, managers of hedge funds, private equity, fund of funds and other alternative investment funds.

Jennifer is a sharp-as-nails, articulate compliance officer who knows how to bring some backbone to the compliance function. Like it or not, sometimes people push back on the compliance person, but she has the intelligence and temperament to be firm but pleasant when someone asks to have the rules bent. She presents well and stays up on the current news affecting the industry. She also brings an unlikely element of fun to her workplace and is appreciated by coworkers.

summary: With CNS Equity Partners and AURA Ventures, Jennifer leverages her expertise in the alternative agriculture and holistic health industries as a corporate consultant for institutional firms and investments.   As a  founder of CNS Equity Partners, a virtue-based private equity firm, she launched the nation’s first holistic health and cannabis herbal retailer. The fully integrated retailer, The Green Heart, is actively franchising  across the United States.Jennifer specializes in international investment regulatory compliance and enterprise risk management with over 15 years of experience in leadership and business management. She has the following certifications: Certified Compliance and Ethics Professional, NRS Investment Advisor Certified Compliance Professional, Chief Compliance Officer Qualifying Examination of Canada, and a combination of investment securities licenses. Jennifer has also worked with foreign licensure and regulatory authorities in Canada, China and other countries. Jennifer is an avid philanthropist and serves as a Board Member for The Green Heart Foundation, a 501(c)3 non profit that educates the public on the health benefits of the superfoods and medicinal herbs,  including hemp and cannabis.
